CustomField.description: If this field is checked, exceptions will be thrown during an async process (Queueable, Batch, @future). Errors will not be written to the Log__c and errors will only be visible from the Apex Job log
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is checked, exceptions will be thrown during an async process (Queueable, Batch, @future). Errors will not be written to the Log__c and errors will only be visible from the Apex Job log
CustomField.label: Allow Async Exceptions
